LE THI DAM MO
Frontend Developer

Address:

Website:  https://www.facebook.com/dammo.le
OBJECTIVE
With 3+ years of experience in the web designing industry including UI/UX implementation and web
development. I believe my collaboration will not only sharing my expertise with your team and valuable clients
but also improving my skills set and becoming an important role in my career path
EDUCATION
Oct 2010 - Aug 2014
University of Pedagogy Ho Chi Minh City
Major: Software Engineering.
Engineer of Information Technology. Faculty of Information Technology
– University of Pedagogy Ho Chi Minh City
WORK EXPERIENCE
Oct 2017 - Present

Frontend Team Leader

- Team management, communication with PM, QC, BE, risk
management and leadership
- Breakdown tasks, analyze tasks and assign the task for the team
member
- Support team member, suggest solutions to resolve issue, review
code
- Focused on developing websites using Front End frameworks - Vue
JS
Aug 2015 - Sep 2017
Sutrix Solutions
Frontend Developer
- Designs, develops and relaunches responsive websites and e-
commerce sites of clients.
- Developing the HTML5 Banner with CSS3 and Greebsock.
Oct 2014 - Jul 2015
Distance Corporation
Software Engineer
- Converting PSD to HTML, HTML Responsive Web
- Designing the banner website
- Coding theme WordPress
1. Singapore Zoo
- Live site: https://www.wrs.com.sg/en/
- Developing the user interface for the website
- Using HTML/CSS/Jquery
2. Globe
- Live site: https://www.globe.com.ph/
- Developing the user interface for the website
- Using HTML/CSS/Jquery
3. Globe - My Account
- Developing the website for Globe's client to manage all product they buy on the Shop
(https://shop.globe.com.ph/) at Globe
- Using HTML/CSS/Vue JS
PROJECTS
Technical Skill
- 3-years experienced in Frontend development.
- Have good knowledge in HTML/HTML5 , PUG, LESS/SASS,
CSS/CSS3, Javascript/jQuery.
- Working experience with Angular 4/VUE JS
- Familiar with Bootstrap and responsive web design concept
- Experienced in using version control systems such as Git
- Experience in working with RESTful API, JSON.
- Experience in working with CMS like AEM
- Knowledge of the analysis and breakdown task
- Familiar with Jira
Personality
- Mature, enthusiastic, hard-working, friendly.
- Be able to work independently or teamwork.
- Be able to work under pressure.
- Responsible, careful in work
- Be always willing to learn to improve capabilities
- Respect others, respect me.
Language English:
- Intermediate in writing and reading
- Basic communicate
SKILLS
INTERESTS
- Listening to music
- Reading books and Traveling.
- Joining social activities.
